Articles.Content:
I would really like to see a screenshot key implemented.

While I know that there are many Steam players and Steam has it's own screenshot key, it would be very nice if there was a dedicated screenshot key for those of us who are non-Steam players.


Happy landings!

I also want a dedicated screenshot key.

Actually, I want two:

  1.  To take a screenshot of everything currently on the screen (as F1 used to do for KSP1)
  2.  To take a screenshot as if F2 has already been pressed -- no UI elements would be included in the screenshot.  This still needs to be done with a single key press.

By the way, if you are on Windows you can use the XBox controls to take a screenshot (but it requires a multiple key press):

  • Windows-Alt-PrintScreen will take the screenshot of the currently active window
    • Some other similar combination will take a screenshot of all monitors on a multi-monitor system (I think it's Alt-PrintScreen
  • Screenshots are stored at Videos > Captures

52 minutes ago, Poppa Wheelie said:
  • Windows-Alt-PrintScreen will take the screenshot of the currently active window
    • Some other similar combination will take a screenshot of all monitors on a multi-monitor system (I think it's Alt-PrintScreen
  • Screenshots are stored at Videos > Captures

Excellent.  Thanks for the tip!


Happy landings!

4 hours ago, Poppa Wheelie said:

Windows-Alt-PrintScreen will take the screenshot

Really? All I have to do is Windows + printscreen, it saves a screenshot to photos instead of captures

Edited April 15, 2023 by Little 908

7 minutes ago, Little 908 said:

Really? All I have to do is Windows + printscreen, it saves a screenshot to photos instead of captures

That takes a screenshot of my entire desktop, not just the screen with KSP2.

Really need a screenshot button in game, though, because reasons.
